1.content:
You are walking home from your High School after a long and tedious day. Your house is about a quarter mile away from your school, and you are taking a shortcut through an empty field. Suddenly, you see a strange light in the grass ahead, like the sun glinting off of polished metal. As you approach, you see it is a ring, half buried in the dirt. Curiously, it does not show any signs of Age or deterioration. As you pick it up to investigate, you see that it is a band of silver, featureless except for a small Sapphire set in it's top, and a small set of runes on the inside of the band. You absentmindedly put it in your pocket, and continue home.

Once you arrive at your house, you take it out to contemplate it. As you reach into your pocket, it slips onto your finger, and you feel a sharp pain. Your head fills with words as you pull your hand out in alarm. Two words in particular rises to your consciousness; Drenith...and Greltor
As your siser Samantha walks into the room, you feel an urge o speak a word aloud.

Curious, what word do you speak?
1.title: Homeward Bound

11.content:
You lift your hand, with the ring on it, and speak to word; "Drenith!"
You feel power rise in your body, and suddenly a thin beam of pale blue light forms on the ring's gemstone, and shoots toward Samantha's body. She looks up curiously at your invocation, and begins to speak.
"Jay, what..."
Suddenly the light strikes her, and she goes ridged. All trace of emotion falls from her face, and her arms drop to her sides. You panic as she stands, terrified that you might have electrified her or something.
"Sam, are you okay?", you ask with worry in your voice.
There is a pause of silence, then she opens her mouth to reply.
"I am fine, Master."

1212122121112.title: Into What?

121212221.content:
Samantha takes a step towards you as you raise your hand, and is suddenly transformed in a magnificent way. Her entire body instantly becomes glorious, glistening metal, shining in the dim light. Her features are all perfectly preserved, and her skin is smooth and flawless. You are dazzled by how her sexy body looks in sparkling metal. You take a few minuates to enjoy the statue before you, before preparing to turn her back.
But then another thought strikes you; you don't have to turn her back. There's no reason Sam can't spend a few days, or weeks-or even years-as a lovely statue. It wouldn't take much to placate mom, and you could check in and admire her every day.
In fact, you could probably start your own gallery...
121212221.title: Gilded Gal

choices: Let her go about her business
1212122212.content:
You decide to turn her back, and enslave her like you did to Mom. You speak the word, and she transforms back into a flesh and blood girl. She stumbles and looks around with a mix of panic and confusion. You feign comfort as she looks around the den in a panic. "It's alright, you blacked out suddenly. You feel alright?"
"I feel fine...I think...", she stumbles a little bit. "Can you get mom? She might be able to help"
You smile slyly as you lift the ring. "Don't worry, I have all the help you need." The beam shoots out and engulfs her. In moments, you sister Samantha is rendered your obedient slave.
"You listen closely Sam, when you awaken from this trance, you will be my slave. You will no longer be your own person, and will be owned by me. You will obey my every command, and I will have absolute control over your life. Do you understand?"
"I understand."
"When I say the words "Mind Sorbet" you will return to this trance. When I snap my fingers, you will leave this trance, and have no memory of being in it. You will have no comprehension of being programmed, and will believe you have always been my slave. Understand?"
"I understand."
You snap you fingers and she looks around, startled. "What's going on, Bro? Did I black out again?"
"None of that matters. I want you to come over here and give me a hug."
She walks over and throws herself into your arms. "Whatever you say, Jay."
"Now kiss me." She hesitates, but finally plants her lips onto yours, with a satisfying, "Your the boss, Jay."
You smile. "Don't call me Jay anymore when we're in private. Call me master."
Sam stares at you. "Why?"
"Well, I am your owner, aren't I? It stands to reason that you should treat me as such."
Sam stares at you uncomfortably for a moment, but finally shakes her head and gets on her knees before you. "How may your slave serve you master?"
Perfect...she's all yours.
1212122212.title: Sister slave

info.brief_description: Jay is walking home when he discovers a ring, which allows him to take control of people.
info.description:
My first test story on this site.
-Keep it relatively clean; don't be too explicit or extended in any sex scenes.
-Little to no homosexuality or lesbianism. While I have nothing against it, it simply does not interest me.
-Mind Control, and asfr heavy story.
-If you want to add a new fetish to the story, please run it by me first.
-Definitely no vore. Sorry.
-Underage characters are a slippery slope as far as I am concerned. I will judge situations as I see fit.

Characters so Far
Family
Jay- This is you, a 15 year old boy, who discovers a relic that will allow him to live his greatest fantasies
Samantha- Jay's 16 year old sister
Kristen- Jays sexy Mother
Julie- Jay's cute 11 year old sister

Neighbors
Angela- Hot milf your mother is acquainted with
Billie and Lana- 12 year old son and 10 year old daughter of Angela

School
